select_font: Set the font you want to use on the dashboard.
select_theme: Select a theme for the dashboard.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.subtitle: Here's a list of your tasks for this month!

import.title: Import Tasks
import.description: Quickly import tasks from a CSV file.
import.success_message: You have imported the following file:

create_update.create_description: Add a new task by providing the necessary information.
create_update.update_description: Update the task by providing the necessary information.

delete.title: Delete this task: {id} ?
delete.description: You are about to delete the task with ID {id}. This action cannot be undone.
delete.success_message: The following task has been deleted:

users.title: User List
users.subtitle: Manage your users and their roles here.

delete.title: Delete User
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{username}}?
delete.description_extended: This action will permanently remove the user with role {{role}} from the system. This action cannot be undone.
delete.warning_description: Be careful, this operation cannot be undone.
delete.user_deleted: The following user has been deleted:

invite.title: Invite User
invite.description: Invite a new user to join your team by sending them an email invitation. Assign a role to determine their level of access.
invite.desc_placeholder: Add a personal note to your invitation (optional)

validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
validation.password_digit: Password must contain at least one digit.

apps.title: App Integrations
apps.subtitle: Here's a list of your apps for integration!

descriptions.telegram: Connect to Telegram for real-time communication.
descriptions.notion: Easily sync Notion pages for seamless collaboration.
descriptions.figma: View and work on Figma designs in one place.
descriptions.trello: Sync Trello cards to streamline project management.
descriptions.slack: Integrate Slack for efficient team communication.
descriptions.zoom: Host Zoom meetings right from your dashboard.
descriptions.stripe: Easily manage Stripe transactions and payments.
descriptions.gmail: Access and manage Gmail messages effortlessly.
descriptions.medium: Explore and share Medium stories on your dashboard.
descriptions.docker: Easily manage Docker containers on your dashboard.
descriptions.github: Streamline code management with GitHub integration.
descriptions.gitlab: Efficiently manage code projects with GitLab integration.
descriptions.discord: Connect to Discord for seamless team communication.
descriptions.whatsapp: Easily integrate WhatsApp for direct messaging.

empty_state.title: Your Messages
empty_state.description: Send a message to start a chat.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
profile.username_description: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym. You can only change this once every 30 days.
profile.username_min: Username must be at least 2 characters.
profile.username_max: Username must not be longer than 30 characters.
profile.email_placeholder: Select a verified email to display
profile.email_description: You can manage verified email addresses in your email settings.
profile.bio_placeholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
profile.bio_description: You can @mention other users and organizations to link to them.
profile.urls_description: Add links to your website, blog, or social media profiles.

account.title: Account
account.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language and timezone.
account.name: Name
account.name_description: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.
account.name_min: Name must be at least 2 characters.
account.name_max: Name must not be longer than 30 characters.
account.dob_description: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
account.language_description: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.notification_type_required: You need to select a notification type.
notifications.communication_emails_description: Receive emails about your account activity.
notifications.marketing_emails_description: Receive emails about new products, features, and more.
notifications.social_emails_description: Receive emails about friend requests, follows, and more.
notifications.security_emails_description: Receive emails about your account activity and security.
notifications.mobile_settings: Use different settings for my mobile devices
notifications.mobile_settings_description: You can manage your mobile notifications on the mobile settings page.

display.title: Display
display.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.
display.sidebar_description: Select the items you want to display in the sidebar.
display.items_required: You must select at least one item.

coming_soon.title: Coming Soon 👀
coming_soon.description: This page is not created yet. Stay tuned for updates!

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: Enter your registered email address and we'll send you a password reset link.

otp.title: Two-Factor Authentication
otp.description: Please enter the authentication code. We've sent an authentication code to your email.
otp.label: One-time password

401.heading: Unauthorized Access
401.description: Please sign in with proper credentials to access this resource.

403.heading: Access Forbidden
403.description: You don't have the necessary permissions to view this resource.

404.heading: Oops! Page Not Found!
404.description: It seems the page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been removed.

500.heading: Oops! Something went wrong
500.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.

503.heading: Site Under Maintenance!
503.description: The site is currently unavailable. We'll be back online soon.
